Last Published: 01 Nov 2011  | Version: 1.0.0-alpha4
Maven 2
Parent Project
  • Maven Plugin for Play! Framework Parent

play:uberzip

Full name:

com.google.code.maven-play-plugin:play-maven-plugin:1.0.0-alpha4:uberzip

Description:

Packages Play! framework and Play! application as one ZIP achive (standalone distribution).

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
uberzipArchiveName String 1.0.0 The name of the generated ZIP file.
Default value is: ${project.build.finalName}.
uberzipOutputDirectory String 1.0.0 The directory for the generated ZIP file.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
playHome File 1.0.0 The directory with Play! distribution.
playId String 1.0.0 Default Play! id (profile).
uberzipClassifier String 1.0.0 Classifier to add to the generated ZIP file.
Default value is: with-framework.
uberzipExcludes String 1.0.0 Application resources exclude filter.
uberzipIncludes String 1.0.0 Application resources include filter
Default value is: app/**,conf/**,public/**,tags/**,test/**.

Parameter Details

playHome:

The directory with Play! distribution.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${play.home}

playId:

Default Play! id (profile).
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${play.id}

uberzipArchiveName:

The name of the generated ZIP file.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${play.uberzipArchiveName}
  • Default: ${project.build.finalName}

uberzipClassifier:

Classifier to add to the generated ZIP file.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${play.uberzipClassifier}
  • Default: with-framework

uberzipExcludes:

Application resources exclude filter.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${play.uberzipExcludes}

uberzipIncludes:

Application resources include filter
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${play.uberzipIncludes}
  • Default: app/**,conf/**,public/**,tags/**,test/**

uberzipOutputDirectory:

The directory for the generated ZIP file.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.0.0
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${play.uberzipOutputDirectory}
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}
